step_data.thought: Looking at the current page, I can see that I'm already on the Customer Groups page. The title of the page is 'Customer Groups / Customers / Magento Admin' and the heading shows 'Customer Groups'. I can see a table listing all the customer groups with their IDs, names, and actions. This page allows me to manage all customer groups, which was the goal. I can see options to add a new customer group, edit existing ones, and other management functions. Since I'm already on the correct page, I should inform the user that the goal has been accomplished.
step_data.action: stop('You are currently on the Customer Groups page where you can manage all customer groups. This page displays all existing groups and provides options to add new groups or edit existing ones.')
